meanings.definition: Turned up or back at the tip, as a nose.
meanings.sent1: Her retrousse nose gave her a cute appearance.
meanings.sent2: The retrousse feature of her nose made her stand out.
meanings.sent3: With her retrousse nose, she could smell the flowers better.
meanings.sent4: The retrousse nose on the statue seemed to be sniffing the air.
meanings.sent5: The retrousse nose was like a little peak on her face.

meanings.definition: A nose that is turned up at the tip.
meanings.sent1: The actress had a distinctive retrousse that set her apart.
meanings.sent2: His retrousse was the subject of many compliments.
meanings.sent3: The clown's fake retrousse made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The retrousse on the sculpture seemed to be pointing upwards.
meanings.sent5: The retrousse on the doll made it look playful.
